name: BrandAwaken
description:
We are a creative branding company. So, what does that really mean? It means we enjoy being creative and using those skills to help clients.
Our branding process combines our creativity with structure, so each of our clients gain clarity no matter their industry or growth phase. Our strategic design combines creativity with meaning, so it is more than just making it look pretty â€“ think design with thought and a plan. We are also proud to be a certified Women-Owned Business.
